snippet: To win Virginia, political analysts say President Obama will have to extend his 2008 inroads in the rapidly growing suburbs deep in the more traditionally Southern parts of the state.
abstract: Pres Obama's re-election campaign is intent on reprising his 2008 victory in Virginia, although political analysts say that he will need to extend inroads in the rapidly growing suburbs deep in the more traditionally Southern parts of the state; his re-election path gets steeper if state is lost.
lead_paragraph: To win Virginia, political analysts say President Obama will have to extend his 2008 inroads in the rapidly growing suburbs deep in the more traditionally Southern parts of the state.

headline.main: Virginia, a State in Flux, Is Also a State in Play
headline.print_headline: Virginia, a State in Flux, Is Also a State in Play
